text: SwamplordKalmah.com Discography is the first studio album by the Finnish melodic death metal band, Kalmah. ==Track listing== ==Credits== ===Band members=== * Antti Kokko − guitar * Pekka Kokko − guitar, vocals * Altti Veteläinen − bass guitar * Pasi Hiltula − keyboard * Petri Sankala − drums ===Production=== * Recorded and mixed at Tico-Tico Studios, Kemi, in September 2000. * Produced by Kalmah and Ahti Kortelainen * Mastered at Finnvox Studios by Mika Jussila ==References== Category:Kalmah albums Category:2000 debut albums Category:Century Media Records albums
title: Swamplord
